modules.description: Handles WebSocket connections using Lwt for asynchronous I/O, providing a function to create connection handlers that process incoming messages and manage client communication. Works with sockets and addresses from the runtime module, along with WebSocket data types for message handling. Designed for building WebSocket-based network services where each connection requires custom input handling and configuration.

This module implements WebSocket client connections with Lwt-based asynchronous I/O. It provides functions to establish a WebSocket handshake over an existing socket, handle incoming messages, and check connection status. It works with low-level sockets and WebSocket data types to enable real-time communication in networked applications like chat clients or live data feeds.

Implements WebSocket communication using Lwt for asynchronous networking. Provides functions to create WebSocket servers that handle client connections and messages, and to establish WebSocket clients that perform handshakes and exchange data over sockets. Suitable for real-time applications such as chat services, live notifications, and streaming data interfaces.
